description: The Facebook, YouTube, & Bing Advertising Beginners Guide is going to show you the step-by-step process of how to advertise like the BIG companies do with a small budget. Online advertising might sound expensive, but with the right strategy you can increase your sales & business online visibility for a VERY small price. Most individual business owners have no idea about these strategies and often times beginners try to advertising online without any knowledge which leads to the LOSS of money and results. In this course, I will take you by the hand and show you how to create & setup your accounts on these advertising platforms and start advertising with a small budget. I show you how to create your ads, interpret your ads results, test/tweek your ads, and scale your ads slowly for maximum results.
title: Facebook, YouTube, & Bing Advertising Beginners Guild
